content: Japan has changed me. I'm back in NYC, but part of me stayed there. Not sure how this new me fits into my old world. Excited, yet uncertain.
raw_content: **Xavier:** Just landed back in NYC after an unforgettable adventure in Japan. The experience was life-changing - I've seen the world through a new lens, embraced spontaneity, and even rekindled my love for sketching. Now, I'm filled with both excitement for what lies ahead and uncertainty about fitting back into my old life. This journey has reshaped me, but will it translate into my future in tech and trading? #LifeChange #BackToReality
